changeSet.author: tolsen
changeSet.comment: Add editss column to resources table
Add rules to update resource views
changeSet.sql: CREATE RULE update_edits AS ON INSERT TO ${plog_schema}.logdata WHERE NEW.request_method = 'PUT' DO UPDATE resources SET edits = edits + 1 WHERE id IN (SELECT parents.id FROM binds INNER JOIN resources parents ON binds.collection_id = parents.id INNER JOIN resources child ON child.id = binds.resource_id WHERE child.uuid = NEW.resource_uuid AND binds.name = 'bitmix.json')
